scripts.cleanBuildProduction: npm run clean && npm run buildProduction
scripts.deepCleanBuild: npm run deepClean && npm install && npm link matterbridge && npm run build
scripts.updateDependencies: npx npm-check-updates -u && npm install && npm link matterbridge && npm run build
scripts.git:status: git status && git branch -vv && git diff main origin/main
scripts.git:hardreset: git fetch origin && git checkout main && git reset --hard origin/main
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm pkg delete devDependencies && npm pkg delete scripts && npm install --omit=dev && npm shrinkwrap
scripts.runMeBeforePublish: npm run lint && npm run format && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.npmPack: copy package.json package.log && npm run buildProduction && npm run postbuild && npm pkg delete devDependencies && npm pkg delete scripts && npx rimraf ./node_modules && npm install --omit=dev && npm shrinkwrap && npm pack && copy package.log package.json && npm run deepCleanBuild
scripts.npmPublishTagDev: copy package.json package.log && npm run buildProduction && npm run postbuild && npm pkg delete devDependencies && npm pkg delete scripts && npx rimraf ./node_modules && npm install --omit=dev && npm shrinkwrap && npm publish --tag dev && copy package.log package.json && npm run deepCleanBuild
scripts.npmPublishTagLatest: copy package.json package.log && npm run buildProduction && npm run postbuild && npm pkg delete devDependencies && npm pkg delete scripts && npx rimraf ./node_modules && npm install --omit=dev && npm shrinkwrap && npm publish --tag latest && copy package.log package.json && npm run deepCleanBuild
scripts.install:eslint: npm uninstall eslint @types/eslint__js && npm install --save-dev @eslint/js typescript-eslint eslint-plugin-n && npm run lint
